title: They Have Everything
description:
Sarah Langs joins Buster to discuss how the White Sox appear to be the best team in baseball right now, Steve Cohen’s Twitter usage and the Angels’ looming budget crunch. Then, Jessica Mendoza stops by to talk about Lewis Brinson answering questions on whether or not a fan yelled a racial slur in Denver, her take on the South Siders and the tanking Orioles.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Sarah Langs on the White Sox, Jessica Mendoza on the tanking Orioles
